Parameter.Label: Night Light
Parameter.Help: In night-light mode the LED on the switch will turn ON when the switch is turned OFF.

Parameter.Label: Invert Switch
Parameter.Help: Change the top of the switch to OFF and the bottom of the switch to ON. Note: If you invert the switches and also install the product upside down, remember the load will now be controlled by the right, not the left switch.

Parameter.Label: Ignore Start-Level (Receiving)
Parameter.Help: This dimmer will start dimming from its current level.

Parameter.Label: On/Off Command Dim Step
Parameter.Help: Indicates how many levels the dimmer will change for each dimming step.

Parameter.Label: On/Off Command Dim Rate
Parameter.Help: This value indicates in 10 millisecond resolution, how often the dim level will change. For example, if you set this parameter to 1, then every 10ms the dim level will change. If you set it to 255, then every 2.55 seconds the dim level will change.

Parameter.Label: Local Control Dim Step
Parameter.Help: Indicates how many levels the dimmer will change for each dimming step.

Parameter.Label: Local Control Dim Rate
Parameter.Help: This value indicates in 10 millisecond resolution, how often the dim level will change. For example, if you set this parameter to 1, then every 10ms the dim level will change. If you set it to 255, then every 2.55 seconds the dim level will change.

Parameter.Label: ALL ON/ALL OFF Dim Step
Parameter.Help: Indicates how many levels the dimmer will change for each dimming step.

Parameter.Label: ALL ON/ALL OFF Dim Rate
Parameter.Help: This value indicates in 10 millisecond resolution, how often the dim level will change. For example, if you set this parameter to 1, then every 10ms the dim level will change. If you set it to 255, then every 2.55 seconds the dim level will change.
